snippet: Some owners of Hyundai Motor Group cars were not surprised when the company admitted it had overstated the fuel economy of 900,000 vehicles sold in the United States.
abstract: Some owners of Hyundai Motor Group cars were not surprised when the company admitted it had overstated the fuel economy of 900,000 vehicles sold in the United States.

headline.main: Hyundai's Fuel Economy Admission Leaves Some Car Owners Cold
headline.print_headline: Buyers Fume at Hyundai’s M.P.G. Admission
